name: Joshua Almeida
about: Hello! I'm Joshua, a passionate web developer and designer with experience creating beautiful and functional websites. I specialize in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, and I love bringing ideas to life through code.
freetime: When I'm not coding, you can find me going on drives to different places, playing online games, learning different coding languages, or reading comics, mangas and manhwas. I believe in continuous learning and am always excited to take on new challenges in the ever-evolving world of web development.
